scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build::tsc
scripts.watch::tsc: npx cross-env ROARR_LOG=true NODE_ENV=development npx tsc --watch
scripts.watch::node: npx cross-env ROARR_LOG=true NODE_ENV=development npx nodemon ./dist/esm/index.js
scripts.start::dev: npx concurrently "npm run watch::tsc --silent" "npm run watch::node"
scripts.start::prod: npm run build && npm run start::node
